attributes.action: Allow children to retake year due to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Children are going to suffer massively from this lost time in school. We understand the need to close schools to protect the nation but something must be done to support the children more, to support our future generation. We cant let them down.
attributes.background: Agree to allow children to retake year as they have missed at least 6 months of schooling. This is going to impact on our children massively especially those children who don’t have access to technology or whose parents are unable to support their home schooling

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326223
